content:
WE ARE looking for a new journalist to strengthen our coverage of sub-Saharan Africa. The job will be based somewhere in Africa—exactly where is open for negotiation with the successful candidate. It will involve a lot of travel.

Applicants should send an original unpublished article of up to 600 words on an African topic suitable for publication in The Economist , a CV and a cover letter to africawriter@economist.com . The deadline for applications is July 19th 2019.

The article is the most important part of the application. We will read it blind (ie, without looking at your name or where you are from). If what you write is not exceptionally good, we will not look at your CV. This is to ensure that the process is as unbiased and meritocratic as possible.

Anyone is welcome to apply, regardless of citizenship, ethnic origin, sex, religious beliefs, disability, sexual orientation or age. Previous experience as a journalist is desirable but not essential. What we most want is original thinking, good analytical skills and, above all, good writing.

ex: n. 申请人，申请者；请求者

wp.Applicant Information: 申请人资料;申请人信息;申请者信息;申请者资料

eg2: This Applicant is by far the better than that one.
这个申请者远比那一个好。
But the college has seen more than one male  “sit back on the couch, sometimes with their eyes closed, while their mom tells them where to go and what to do.
但是，在大学里不止会看到一两个男性申请人“靠在椅子上，有时候还闭着眼，悠闲自得。 有时候还要他妈妈告诉他该去哪，该做什么。
One such questionnaire shall be presented to each .
每位申请人均将得到这样一份问卷。

ex: adj. 分析的；解析的；善于分析的
adj. 令人满意的；值得要的
eg2: Yes, it is one result of love, and the most desirable one.
对，这是恋爱的其中一种结果，也是最为人期望的结果。
This is certainly not , but if it meant a stronger agreement that addressed the seriousness of the problem, it may not be that bad.
“这肯定是不可取的，但如果它意味着一份解决了问题严重性的更强有力的协议，那也未必是坏事，”他说。
Doing so is often , since it can increase the number of client types for your business logic.
这样做是值得的，因为这样做可以为您的业务逻辑增加客户端类型的数量。

ex: n. 障碍；（指状态、身心、学习等方面的）缺陷
网络 残疾；无能；失能
eg2: a physical/mental disability
生理缺陷；心理障碍
people with severe learning disabilities
具有严重学习障碍的人
He qualifies for help on the grounds of disability.
他因身有残疾有资格得到帮助。

wp.Essential Information: 重要信息;		基本信息;基本资料
wp.essential water: 组成水;组成水份;必需水
wp.Essential hypertension: 原发性高血压;高血压;高血压病;特发性高血压
wp.essential balm: 清凉油;风油精;牌风油精;清凉油及薄荷膏
wp.essential patent: 必要专利;基本专利;必要性专利;标准之必要专利
wp.Essential Criteria: 基本素质;基本准则;基本标准;各原则对应的必要标准
wp.essential mineral: 知矿物;基本矿物;主成份矿物;主要矿物
wp.essential thrombocythemia: 原发性血小板增多症;多症;血小板过多症

ex: adj. 基本的；必要的；本质的；精华的
n. 本质；要素；要点；必需品
eg2: We see this as  for the success of any development effort.
我们把这看作是任何开发工作成功的必要因素。
Thus, an essential assumption of this method is that requirements must be well understood before development can go forward.
因而，这种方法的一个必要假定是需求必须在开发能够进行之前被充分地理解。
The essential sections of this article guide you through these steps for setting up distributed testing by installing software on the client machines.
本文的本质内容是指导您通过在客户端机器上安装软件，完成这些步骤来设置分布式的测试。

wp.extremely exceptionally: 您这汉语说得倍儿棒啊

ex: adv. 异常地；特殊地；例外地
eg2: It possesses incredible strength and elasticity, while its exceptionally high conductivity and use in flexible semiconductors could soup up computing.
它具有难以置信的强度和弹性，而其异常的高导电性和半导体中灵活的应用可以提高计算能力。
Though nearly 50, he is  vigorous in work.
别看他快50岁了， 工作却是雷厉风行。
I want to pay tribute to all those working in these exceptionally difficult situations.
我要向所有在这些极端困难境况下工作的人们致以敬意。

ex: 网络 议付；交涉；押汇
eg2: peace/trade/wage, etc. negotiations
和谈、贸易洽谈、工资谈判等
They begin another round of negotiations today.
他们今天开始另一轮的谈判。
to enter into/open/conduct negotiations with sb
和某人开始╱展开╱进行谈判
The rent is a matter for negotiation between the landlord and the tenant.
租金可以由房东和租户协商确定。
A contract is prepared in negotiation with our clients.
我们和客户协商起草了一份合同。
The issue is still under negotiation .
这个问题还在商讨之中。
The price is generally open to negotiation .
一般来讲，价格可以商量。

wp.Orientation Week: 迎新周;新生训练周;适应周;新生周
wp.biaxial orientation: 双轴取向;双轴顺向;单轴与背
wp.preferential orientation: 择优定向;优先定位;最佳取向;择优取向
wp.interior orientation: 内部定向;内部取向;内定向;内方位
wp.orientation meeting: 指学校综合情况;新生报到会;情况说明会;学期前会议

ex: n. 方向；定向；适应；情况介绍
eg2: How should I choose the  of my curves?
我应该怎样选择曲线的方向呢？
The winding trail caused us to lose our .
迂回曲折的小道使我们迷失了方向。
We need to avoid these spurious 0,0 readings, as about one out of every 10 readings at any  of the sensor will be 0,0 -- invalid data, indeed.
需要避免这些虚假的 0,0 读数，来自传感器各个方向上的每 10 个读数中就会有一个读数是 0,0 —— 无效的数据，确实如此。

wp.Suitable material: 适用材料;适合材料;典型物料;适用原料
wp.suitable pinky: 合适的小指;适合张文慈;适用于小指
wp.Suitable applications: 适合应用;适合应用闭环

eg2: They have pitched upon the most suitable man for the job.
他们已选好最适当的人来做那项工作。
The diet should be , being neither too rich nor too meagre.
饮食应该适当， 既不能太油腻也不能太粗淡。
The local shops have been marked in on this map so that people can choose a house in a suitable area.
这张地图已将当地的一些商店增加进去，这样人们就能在适当的地区内选择住所。

wp.unpublished data: 未发表资料;未发表数据
wp.Unpublished Manuscript: 未出版手稿;未出版之手稿

ex: adj. 未公开出版的；未发表过的

Title: We’re hiring a journalist to write about Africa

paperStatistics.title: We’re hiring a journalist to write about Africa
